title: Secret of the Crystal II - The Forge
description:
Do you like fast paced and action packed Science Fiction?  
  Then you'll love Part II of this non-stop action adventure series.
In this second installment of "Secret of the Crystal" Jhahnahkan is faced with discovering a way to unlock the memories that have been sealed in his mind in order to defeat the Rune. His people have plunged into civil war and unrest as North fights against the South. He races to discover the secret location within the crystal caverns, in search for the legend of the Crystal Forge. ˃˃˃ Dynamic. . . Intriguing. . . Very enjoyable, are just some of the words that describe how the readers feel  ˃˃˃ Fasten your seat belts and hold on for this fantastic ride.  
  Scroll up and grab a copy today.
author: Brian K. Larson
